titles.title: Electing Members, Delegates, and the Resident Commissioner to serve on standing committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Elects Members, Delegates, and the Resident Commissioner to the following House standing Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Appropriations; (3) Banking and Financial Services; (4) Budget; (5) Commerce; (6) Education and the Workforce; (7) Government Reform and Oversight (name changed to Government Reform pursuant to unanimous consent agreement on January 19, 1999); (8) House Administration; (9) International Relations; (10) Judiciary; (11) National Security (name changed to Armed Services pursuant to unanimous consent agreement on January 19, 1999); (12) Resources; (13) Rules; (14) Science; (15) Small Business; (16) Standards of Official Conduct; (17) Transportation and Infrastructure; (18) Veterans' Affairs; (19) Ways and Means; and (20) Intelligence.
